author: Anirudh
title: “I Almost Died” – 18-Year-Old TikTok Star Caleb Coffee Opens Up About Falling Onto Lava Rocks During a Hike for a Noble Cause
description: A well-known TikToker, Caleb Coffee, who garnered 11 million followers, courtesy of his daredevil TikTok stunts, faced a life-threatening ordeal. The social media personality plummeted 80ft from a Hawaiian cliff onto searing lava rocks. The 18-year-old, boasting 11 million followers, shared his harrowing experience. author: Alex Henderson
title: B​ail bondsman becomes first Trump co-defendant to surrender: Will 'any defendants use his services'?
description: Of the four criminal indictments that former President Donald Trump is facing, Fulton County, Georgia District Attorney Fani Willis' case is the most expansive. Trump has 18 co-defendants in Willis' prosecution, and on Tuesday, August 22, Atlanta-based bail bondsman Scott Hall became the first co-defendant to surrender. Hall, CNN reports, has "turned himself in" to the Fulton County Jail in Atlanta. CNN notes, "Hall is facing seven charges, including the racketeering count that's central to Willis' prosecution, as well as several charges stemming from the Coffee County allegations. The Fulton...

author: Mbalenhle Zuma
title: DJ Bushida Coffee deletes Papa Penny’s track after outburst
description: Musician and reality star Eric Kulani Giyani Nkovani, better known by his stage names Penny Penny and Papa Penny, is fuming after his song Hai Ka Mina was played by a local DJ and producer. Papa Penny took to his social media to blast the DJ known as Bushida Coffee for allegedly sampling his song […]

author: Betsy Marston
title: Writers on the Range: John Fielder, the man who loved natural beauty
description: If you’ve ever bought a calendar or coffee table book featuring the grandeur of Colorado’s 14’ers, the stunning color photographs were almost certainly by John Fielder. His output was stupendous: over 40 books of Colorado landscapes published during his career as a nature photographer, which began in 1981. No doubt he had many more books to produce before pancreatic cancer took him on Aug. 11. He was 73. One book, though, became his blockbuster, appealing to almost everybody’s curiosity about how Colorado had changed over the last 130 years. Called “Colorado, 1870-2000,” the large...

title: TikTok and lattes make the perfect blend for Toronto coffee company going viral
description: Two simple words -- "my friend" -- have made Caitlin Campbell and Street Brew Coffee a global success and vaulted her into the hearts of so many.

author: Susie Burrell
title: Is your morning cup of coffee doing you more harm than good?
description: Calories from your morning coffee don’t count, right? Well, maybe they do – especially if you’re starting the day with a jumbo latte. Here’s how to enjoy your morning caffeine fix while also looking after your health.
